channel.title: Mask on ShardingSphere
channel.description: Recent content in Mask on ShardingSphere

item.title: CREATE MASK RULE
item.description: Description The CREATE MASK RULE syntax is used to create a mask rule. Syntax Grammar Railroad diagram CreateEncryptRule ::= 'CREATE' 'MASK' 'RULE' maskRuleDefinition (',' maskRuleDefinition)* maskRuleDefinition ::= ruleName '(' 'COLUMNS' '(' columnDefinition (',' columnDefinition)* ')' ')' columnDefinition ::= '(' 'NAME' '=' columnName ',' maskAlgorithmDefinition ')' maskAlgorithmDefinition ::= 'TYPE' '(' 'NAME' '=' maskAlgorithmType (',' propertiesDefinition)? ')' propertiesDefinition ::= 'PROPERTIES' '(' key '=' value (',' key '=' value)* ')' ruleName ::= identifier columnName ::= identifier maskAlgorithmType ::= literal key ::= string value ::= literal Supplement maskAlgorithmType specifies the data masking algorithm type, please refer to Data Masking Algorithm; Duplicate ruleName will not be created.

item.title: ALTER MASK RULE
item.description: Description The ALTER MASK RULE syntax is used to create a mask rule. Syntax Grammar Railroad diagram AlterEncryptRule ::= 'ALTER' 'MASK' 'RULE' maskRuleDefinition (',' maskRuleDefinition)* maskRuleDefinition ::= ruleName '(' 'COLUMNS' '(' columnDefinition (',' columnDefinition)* ')' ')' columnDefinition ::= '(' 'NAME' '=' columnName ',' maskAlgorithmDefinition ')' maskAlgorithmDefinition ::= 'TYPE' '(' 'NAME' '=' maskAlgorithmType (',' propertiesDefinition)? ')' propertiesDefinition ::= 'PROPERTIES' '(' key '=' value (',' key '=' value)* ')' ruleName ::= identifier columnName ::= identifier maskAlgorithmType ::= literal key ::= string value ::= literal Supplement maskAlgorithmType specifies the data masking algorithm type, please refer to Data Masking Algorithm.

item.title: DROP MASK RULE
item.description: Description The DROP MASK RULE syntax is used to drop existing mask rule. Syntax Grammar Railroad diagram DropEncryptRule ::= 'DROP' 'MASK' 'RULE' ruleName (',' ruleName)* ruleName ::= identifier Example Drop mask rule DROP MASK RULE t_mask, t_mask_1; Reserved words DROP, MASK, RULE Related links Reserved word
